description: This file defines the FundTransferMapper class which extends BaseMapper to convert between FundTransfer DTOs and FundTransferEntity objects, facilitating data transfer and entity mapping within the application.

classes.name: FundTransferMapper
classes.description: Mapper class to convert between FundTransfer DTO and FundTransferEntity entity objects, extending BaseMapper.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a FundTransfer DTO into a FundTransferEntity object by copying properties.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a FundTransferEntity into a FundTransfer DTO by copying properties.
